Comment: America deserves an honest and competent leader, not a deranged puppet who is hell-bent on revenge, destruction, bullying, and pillaging. This president should resign in disgrace, for this open and massive corruption. The public outcry should be unanimous, from all non-cult members in every corner of the country. These are not “white collar” crimes; these are “red maga hat/orange collar” crimes from a self-described “day 1 dictator”, who violates his oath to the constitution on a daily basis.  Unfortunately, he is not “busted” until being charged with a crime and convicted. If the pesky DOJ “memo” about not charging sitting presidents gets in the way, then congress must impeach and remove him immediately. By the way, the DOJ used to function independently of the executive, not used as a revenge tool of GOP fascists, so maybe that 1970s memo should be updated for 2025.
